abilities.name: Beacons of Rage
abilities.rule: While a friendly **WORLD EATERS** unit is within 6" of this unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack that targets a unit (excluding **MONSTERS** and **VEHICLES**), add 1 to the Hit roll. If that attack targets a unit (excluding **MONSTERS** and **VEHICLES**) that is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.
